Description: A group of physicists from Iowa State University have finally proven that the 'most brilliant auroras are produced by powerful electromagnetic waves during geomagnetic storms,' according to a newly released study
Title: The mysterious origin of the northern lights has been proven CTV News
Author: Jennifer Gray

Description: COVID 19 therapies made from a cocktail of two types of antibodies were effective against a wide range of variants of the coronavirus in a mice and hamster study, the Washington University School of Medicine in St Louis reported on Monday
Title: Dual antibody drugs effective against COVID 19 variants in animal study Reuters
Author: Dania Nadeem

Description: Researchers at Oxford University said on Thursday they have developed a method to predict the efficacy of new COVID 19 vaccines based on a blood test, potentially offering a short cut around massive clinical trials that are increasingly difficult to conduct
Title: Oxford researchers say they developed blood test predictor of vaccine efficacy Reuters
Author: Ludwig Burger

Description: Between 1969 and 1975, the Communicative Arts Academy was a vital hub for a community largely excluded from Los Angeles s cultural institutions
Title: In Compton, a School That Paved the Way for Generations of Black Artists
Author: Melissa Smith

Description: Jerry Falwell Jr is asking a court in Virginia to dismiss the lawsuit Liberty University filed over his headline grabbing departure last year as leader of the evangelical school
Title: Falwell Liberty University lawsuit is excuse to shame him
Author: The Associated Press
